inclusion.criterion: female subjects either postmenopausal status or under proper contraception during the course of the study are allowed to be enrolled
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject informed willing to participate and ICF signed and dated properly
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: hypercalcaemia/ se Ca levels out of 2.20-2.60 mmol/L range
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: symptoms or lab results of elevated se Ca during the last year
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: hypercalciuria within the last two years
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: sever kidney disease ( CKD 3 or higher grade)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Paget's Disease of Bone and will be treated with Bisphosphonate. His sister had the same problems.
